data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 223,943 believers in Baden-Württemberg, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Baden-Württemberg, Germany
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Baden-Württemberg, Germany find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Baden-Württemberg, Germany.
data.prayer: Father, make yourself real to these new families.
Spirit, train the church of Baden-Württemberg, Germany to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, help the 223,943 believers in Baden-Württemberg to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 10,520,957 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Turk people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Baden-Württemberg.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 10,744,900 citizens of Baden-Württemberg, Germany, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.section_summary:
the state of Baden-Württemberg, Germany has a population of 10,744,900.

We estimate Baden-Württemberg has 223,943 people who might know Jesus, 6,358,467 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,162,490 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 47 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 6,358,467 people in the state of Baden-Württemberg who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.
